description: The central tower of Enies Lobby where CP9 agents conduct their operations. It contains multiple floors with various rooms and is connected to the Bridge of Hesitation leading to the Gates of Justice.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Defeats Kumadori
keyEvents.description: Chopper in Monster Point defeats Kumadori and throws his body toward the Courthouse.
keyEvents.significance: One of the major CP9 battles concludes in the Tower of Justice.

keyEvents.title: Nami vs Kalifa Begins
keyEvents.description: Nami confronts Kalifa in the Tower of Justice to obtain Robin's key.
keyEvents.significance: The Tower serves as the battleground for one of the arc's notable female battles.

keyEvents.title: Kalifa's Devil Fruit Demonstration
keyEvents.description: Kalifa fully demonstrates her Awa Awa no Mi powers, covering the floor with strength-draining bubbles.
keyEvents.significance: The Tower's interior becomes a dangerous battlefield filled with soap bubbles.

culturalSignificance: Represents the World Government's judicial authority and serves as the headquarters for CP9 operations at Enies Lobby.

description: A long bridge connecting the Tower of Justice to the Gates of Justice. Criminals being transferred to their final judgment walk this bridge, giving them one last moment to hesitate before facing their fate.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Catches Up to Robin
keyEvents.description: Luffy finally reaches the tunnel/bridge where Spandam and Rob Lucci are escorting Robin toward the Gates of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: The Bridge of Hesitation becomes the setting for the confrontation between Luffy and Rob Lucci.

culturalSignificance: Symbolically named as the last place where criminals can hesitate before being handed over to the World Government's final judgment. The bridge represents the point of no return.
